job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving AI tools for customer support rather than developing or engineering AI models. While it mentions 'AI Training and Improvement' and 'AI model fine-tuning sessions', the core responsibilities revolve around supporting existing AI systems and integrating human expertise, which aligns more with an application support role than a dedicated AI engineering position.

phrases.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand the nature of customer issues and how they are being handled by AI, implying a need to grasp the business context of customer support.

phrases.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
phrases.justification: This requires understanding the limitations of current AI and the specific business needs that are not being met.

phrases.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
phrases.justification: This directly relates to understanding how to combine different approaches to meet business objectives in customer support.
Suggests involvement in enhancing the performance of AI, which could indirectly relate to model improvement.

phrases.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
phrases.justification: Directly implies involvement in the process of adjusting AI models, which falls under modeling.

phrases.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
phrases.justification: This involves experimenting with and evaluating AI models or systems, a form of modeling or model evaluation.

phrases.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
phrases.justification: Prototyping and testing can involve software development aspects to integrate and evaluate new tools.

phrases.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
phrases.justification: Highlights the need to quickly learn and adapt to multiple products.

phrases.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
phrases.justification: Implies a need to learn and adapt to new AI technologies and approaches.

phrases.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
phrases.justification: Requires analyzing and solving complex customer issues.

phrases.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
phrases.justification: Involves identifying and addressing gaps where AI is insufficient, a problem-solving activity.
Directly points to the ability to independently solve problems and overcome obstacles.

phrases.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities
phrases.justification: Requires finding practical ways to combine different elements to achieve a goal.
Suggests taking initiative to enhance existing systems.

phrases.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
phrases.justification: Indicates a proactive approach to exploring and implementing new solutions.
Demonstrates taking ownership of one's work and progress.
